issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Upgrade sqlparser to 0.8 to support parsing all TPC-H queries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11574](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11574). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This change supports parsing all original TCP-H quries.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11574?focusedCommentId=17282612) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
